short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use 45 Minutes Timer for wake up in 45 Minutes. Set timer for 45 Minutes from now with an alarm. It is a free and easy-to-use timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Set timer for 45 minutes

If you want to set alarm for 45 minutes from right now, then this extension for you. Using it you can set 45 minutes (Thirty Minutes) for your work like  coding, play game, study, cooking, walk or exercises and anything else you want to do.

This 45 Minutes Timer sample user interface and easy to use for completely free.

How to use it?

=> You don't need any thing else, it has automatic set up for you. Just click on the "Start" button, then the countdown timer will start. 

You can pause, resume, restart and reset the timer anytime you want by clicking the timer controls button.

When the timer is complete, it will alert you with a sound.

Enjoy the extension :)

Thanks!
